columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the Private DNS zone.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a Private DNS zone uniquely.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the Private DNS zone.

columns.name: max_number_of_record_sets
columns.description: The maximum number of record sets that can be created in this Private DNS zone.

columns.name: number_of_record_sets
columns.description: The current number of record sets in this Private DNS zone.

columns.name: max_number_of_virtual_network_links
columns.description: The maximum number of virtual networks that can be linked to this Private DNS zone.

columns.name: number_of_virtual_network_links
columns.description: The current number of virtual networks that are linked to this Private DNS zone.

columns.name: max_number_of_virtual_network_links_with_registration
columns.description: The maximum number of virtual networks that can be linked to this Private DNS zone with registration enabled.

columns.name: number_of_virtual_network_links_with_registration
columns.description: The current number of virtual networks that are linked to this Private DNS zone with registration enabled.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the resource. Possible values include: `Creating`, `Updating`, `Deleting`, `Succeeded`, `Failed`, `Canceled`.
